item.title: Fisherman helps himself to thousands from employer and sells company van
item.description: Lewis Collinson, 38, from Bridlington, admitted three theft offences totalling more than Â£35,000 from Enterprise Fishing Ltd at Hull Crown Court

item.title: Desperate hunt for UK fisherman after empty boat washes up with engine running
item.description: The 28-year-old has not been seen since his creel boat ran aground with the engine still running on Inverbervie Beach, Aberdeenshire
